text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Hypnotizes up to 2 of the toughest Zombies or 1 Gargantuar, then vanishes.

$(br)$(#bd951a)"People ask if I have all these charms to ward off evil Zombies or if it's a new fashion trend. But I can't bring myself to tell them the truth: that it's for good luck in my entrance exams."
